```lisp
[
  (:action boil_macaroni
    :parameters (?p - player ?m - macaroni ?w - water ?pot - boiling_pot ?s - salt ?o - oil)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?m ?bag) (in ?w ?pipes) (in ?pot ?cabinet) (in ?s ?container) (in ?o ?container))
    :effect (and (in ?m ?boiling_pot) (in ?w ?boiling_pot) (in ?s ?boiling_pot) (in ?o ?boiling_pot) (boiling ?w))
  )

  (:action cool_macaroni
    :parameters (?p - player ?m - macaroni ?w - water)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?m ?boiling_pot) (boiled ?m))
    :effect (and (in ?m ?strainer) (cooling ?m))
  )

  (:action boil
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?water - water ?pot - boiling_pot ?salt - salt ?oil - oil ?strainer - strainer)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?item ?bag) (in ?water ?pipes) (in ?pot ?cabinet) (in ?salt ?container) (in ?oil ?container) (not (boiled ?item)))
    :effect (and (in ?item ?boiling_pot) (boiling ?water))
  )

  (:action toss_macaroni
    :parameters (?p - player ?m - macaroni ?o - oil ?pan - pan)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?m ?strainer) (in ?o ?container) (in ?pan ?cabinet))
    :effect (and (in ?m ?pan) (in ?o ?pan) (on_stove ?pan))
  )

  (:action add_ingredients
    :parameters (?p - player ?ing - ingredient ?pan - pan)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?ing ?container) (on_stove ?pan))
    :effect (in ?ing ?pan)
  )

  (:action toss
    :parameters (?p - player ?item1 - object ?item2 - object ?container1 - container ?container2 - container ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (in ?item1 ?container1) (in ?item2 ?container2) (available ?container2))
    :effect (and (in ?item1 ?container2) (in ?item2 ?container2))
  )

  (:action add
    :parameters (?actor - player ?item - object ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?location) (contains ?container ?base_item) (available ?item))
    :effect (and (contains ?container ?item) (mixed ?container))
  )

  (:action cook_macaroni
    :parameters (?p - player ?m - macaroni ?pan - pan)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?m ?pan) (mixed ?m) (on_stove ?pan))
    :effect (cooked ?m)
  )

  (:action serve_macaroni
    :parameters (?p - player ?m - macaroni ?plate - plate)
    :precondition (and (cooked ?m) (at ?p ?kitchen) (clean ?plate))
    :effect (served ?m ?plate)
  )

  (:action cook
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - food ?container - container ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?location) (in ?item ?container) (prepared ?item) (ready_to_cook ?container) (not (cooked ?item)))
    :effect (cooked ?item)
  )

  (:action serve
    :parameters (?p - player ?resource - object ?container - container ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?kitchen) (in ?resource ?container))
    :effect (and (at ?resource ?location) (served ?resource))
  )
]
```
